_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The six sense bases and their associated: The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
The pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
The process of disillusionment and freed: Seeing the impermanence, suffering, and non-self nature of the six sense bases and their associated feelings
Understanding that rebirth is ended, the spiritual journey has been completed, what had to be done has been done, and there is no return to any state of existence.
